segments.text: He thought he could take Jimmy in , but you know , Jimmy is no fool .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So Jimmy just took him in instead and it cost him an arm and a leg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean finally Henry bought the broken car himself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . Herry is almost broken now .
segments.speaker: S1
